You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesI I] > &iopf;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Iopf;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D540.
  * `&iopf;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D55A.
